name: ExtraWare
description:
This game was made in two days for:

The Very First Extra Credits Game Design Jam!

The theme was their "Awesome Per Second" video.

So I made my own version of the game with the highest ratio of fun per second, WarioWare! And gave it an Extra Credits spin.

The game has 12 microgames, each with its own variations, and 9 of those are based on the 9 games I've made prior to this one.

So... yeah, enjoy it and try to get a highscore! Not too high though, or you'll spend too much time playing and the Awesome per Second ratio will get too low.

The awesome background music is done by Matthew Koh.

If I make a full game out of this I'll put it here, keep waiting for now.
